definitions.title: vb. Pa.
definitions.body: pray (orig. bow in prayer) (Targum id., bow, Pa, pray, so Syr. s.lo0 and Pa.; As. sullû, entreat (appar. not of prayer to gods Zim:KAT 3. 610 f.); Ar. s.alan0 middle of the back, s.l0 II. pray, Eth. s’alawa: bow, s’alaya: pray; Sab. [[חלות]] shrine Hom:Chr125; AA 185);—Pt. [[מְחַלֵּא]] Da 6:11 (abs.); pl. [[מְחַלַּ֫יִן]] (K:§ 47a)) Ezr 6:10 (c. [[ל]] in behalf of).
